title: Panels, 19th century
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt, from the textile collection of Mrs. Abram Stevens Hewitt
description: four vertical panels of red voided velvet - design of dragon, clouds, bats, waves, spray flaming jewels, etc.  ground of satin - lined with blue figured silk.

tombstone.epitaph:
Panels, 19th century.
19th century. Technique: velvet, cut and voided. Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt, from the textile collection of Mrs. Abram Stevens Hewitt. 1931-4-38-a/d.
